title: Puppet Show: Lost Town v1.0 full and data
description:
After discovering a new system of caves, the entire town is excited to exploreâ€¦until little Suzy is kidnapped by a mechanical beast! Emerging from the darkness and startling the townfolk, the creature causes a cave-in behind him, leaving no trail to follow.

TRACK DOWN A MECHANICAL KIDNAPPER BEAST!
Track the creature down and explore the mysterious caves that hide more secrets and mysteries that you can imagine!

GET TO THE BOTTOM OF A DARK SECRET!
Solve a variety of mystical puzzles and use items found in haunting hidden object scenes while you explore the run-down mining town and search for Suzy!

GORGEOUS, IMMERSIVE ATMOSPHERE!
Clear a cave-in and explore a beautifully eerie system of caves! Open coffins, examine skeletons, stumble upon puppet parts, pass through rusty gates, and MORE!

A NEW PLAY MODE TO ENJOY!
Try new match-3 play mode while on a HOG-scene! Switch between finding objects and matching tokens whenever you want! Play it your way!

GET COLLECTORâ€™S EDITION BONUS CONTENT!
Extra puzzles and mini-games, exclusively creepy scenes, bonus hidden object scenes, 17 pieces of unique artwork, and 4 spook-tacular soundtracks are waiting for you in Collectorâ€™s Edition!

The READ_PHONE_STATE permission is used to generate unique hash of a device. No private data is being stored anywhere.

Requirements: Android OS 4.0 and up
Install APK. Place data folder in SDCard/Android/Obb/ and play
